attributes.description:
Welcome to Cars.Com2, where we sell reliable cars in all price ranges. We aim to provide you with exceptional service, sound financial advice and affordable quality. All our customers can expect the very highest standards of sales and service excellence. Visit our Full Range of vehicles at Please note, advertised sales prices does not include License and Registration fees, nor Dealer Admin Fees.

At our Branch we are proud to introduce for sale this immaculate 2016 Jeep Renegade 1.6 MJET LTD. It features, Aircon, Power Steering, Airbags, Aux, Bluetooth, Radio/CD, USB, Leather seats, Multifunction Steering, Electric Windows, Electric Mirrors, Reverse Camera, Touch screen display, Navigation, Cruise Control, Central Locking, Park Sensors, Park Distance Control(PDC) and Mags.

Nation Wide Delivery 15 years successful track record, trusted dealer with a selection of 50 cars under one roof. First payment in 60 days Everybody knows that Cars.Com2 rules MOTOR TOWN. Enquire now for friendly, professional, efficient and fast service. Its easy to do business with Cars.Com2.
